articles.title: On Rose Day, Kartik Aaryan shares throwback video of when he got a rose from a young girl - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Kartik Aaryan received a red rose from a young fan on Rose Day. Watch his response here. His fans, too, loved the gesture.
articles.content:
Celebrating Rose Day on Sunday, actor Kartik Aaryan shared a video showing him getting a rose from a young fan. As per reports, it was a throwback video.

articles.title: Actor Allu Arjun's Vanity Van 'Falcon' Damaged in Road Mishap in Telangana - News18
articles.description: Telugu film star Allu Arjun's vanity van was hit by a container lorry in Khammam district in Telangana and the driver and an attendant who were travelling in the vehicle escaped unhurt, police said on Sunday.
